alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Wallace and Sherman Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1025 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Ruleton to 12 miles north of Wallace. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Ruleton around 1035 PM MDT. Goodland around 1045 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 8 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
